sect1.title: Intorduction
sect1.para: This is a soft-cpu project with it's own asm language and hand written function to work with text and a stack to store data during it's work.

sect1.title: ASM
sect1.para: Language consists of commands: push, pop, add, sub, mult, div, out. dump, hlt, pop, jmp, ja, jae, jb, jbe, je, jne, call, ret, video, in. More info on those commands can be seen in cmd.h, i.e. how they work and what they do.
